name: Idol Comm@nder (DD9 Edition)
description:
This is the first demo for my rhythm game, Idol Comm@nder.

In this game, as you would expect, you press the right button at the right time matching the beats of the song to rack up points and combos and get a great grade at the end!

But that's not all: the girl (in this case Bunny) will dance to the beat (although for now her dance doesn't always match the song, I plan to fix that in the future) and her performance depends on yours! If you play well Bunny will dance and her fans will cheer for her, bur if you miss a beat she will trip and be sad.

You don't want to make Bunny cry, do you? Then practice and HIT THE BEATS! Aim for a huge score to unlock the secret costume for Bunny!

The game uses the QWER keys, plus the SPACE BAR to pause the game/skip the intro.

If you have any kind of feedback, please tell me. I'm aware that in some points the beatmap doesn't perfectly match the song but I've struggled a lot to get it to where it is now. Prease understandu.
